description: Interfering device is detected.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11SaIntfDevDetected HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11SaTrapAPID s EXAMPLE HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11SaTrapRadioID i 9999 HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11SaTrapDevID i 9999 HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11SaTrapIntfDevType i 1 HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11APTrapDevSI i 9999 HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11SaTrapDevRSSI i 9999 HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11APTrapDevDC i 9999 HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11APTrapDevChls s EXAMPLE HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11APTrapDevDctTime s EXAMPLEE

description: Represents the identifier of the AP.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11SaTrapAPID

description: Represents the identifier of the radio.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11SaTrapRadioID

description: Represents the device identification number that uniquely
identified the interfering device.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11SaTrapDevID

description: Represents type of the interferer.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11SaTrapIntfDevType

description: Represents severity index of the interfering device. Severity index
is calculated, a positive integer between 0 and 100(with 100 being the
most severe).
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11APTrapDevSI

description: Represents receive signal strength indicator (RSSI) of interfering
device.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11SaTrapDevRSSI

description: Represents proportion of time in percentage during which the
interfering device was active.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11APTrapDevDC

description: Represents channels that the interfering device affects.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11APTrapDevChls

description: Represents time at which the interference was detected.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11APTrapDevDctTime

description: Interfering device disappeared.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11SaIntfDevDisappear HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11SaTrapAPID s EXAMPLE HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11SaTrapRadioID i 9999 HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11SaTrapDevID i 9999 HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11SaTrapIntfDevType i 1

description: Represents the identifier of the AP.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11SaTrapAPID

description: Represents the identifier of the radio.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11SaTrapRadioID

description: Represents the device identification number that uniquely
identified the interfering device.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11SaTrapDevID

description: Represents type of the interferer.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11SaTrapIntfDevType

description: The quality of the channel is below the specified threshold.

event.Summary: Quality of the channel $v4 is below the specified threshold

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11SaChlQltLow HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11SaTrapAPID s EXAMPLE HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11SaTrapRadioID i 9999 HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11SaTrapChlNum i 9999 HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11SaTrapChlQlt i 9999 HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11SaTrapChlIntfNum i 9999

description: Represents the identifier of the AP.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11SaTrapAPID

description: Represents the identifier of the radio.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11SaTrapRadioID

description: Represents the radio channel where the air quality is monitored.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11SaTrapChlNum

description: Represents the quality for this radio channel.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11SaTrapChlQlt

description: Represents the number of interferers detected by the radios
on the 802.11a/n or 802.11b/g/n radio band.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11SaTrapChlIntfNum

description: The quality of the channel recovered from low status.

event.Summary: Quality of the channel $v4 recovered to normal

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11SaChlQltRecover HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11SaTrapAPID s EXAMPLE HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11SaTrapRadioID i 9999 HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11SaTrapChlNum i 9999 HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11SaTrapChlQlt i 9999 HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11SaTrapChlIntfNum i 9999

description: Represents the radio channel where the air quality is monitored.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-SA-MIB::hh3cDot11SaTrapChlNum

description: Represents the quality for this radio channel.

description: Represents the number of interferers detected by the radios
